title: Our First Guest Confirmed!
content:
We're excited to announce the first guest this year for JAFAX 2022!

Our first guest to JAFAX is a new face to the event, Tia Ballard, an accomplished voice actor of animé and video games, writer, and director of English adaptations of popular animé titles. Her most recent roles include Zero Two from "Darling in the Franxx" and Kagura from the 2019 release of "Fruits Basket" and many, many more.
